The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 January is 2,664,129 (4,733.1 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 05 January, there were 366,346 new confirmed cases (650.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 December, there were 270,484 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 35% (95,862 extra cases).
